title: The Young Oxford Book of Timewarp Stories
description: What would happen if you could take a holiday in the past? Meet a man from the future? Write letters to a ghost? Or even stop time altogether? Find out in The Young Oxford Book of Timewarp Stories , a mesmerizing collection of stories that takes readers on some of the most fantastically strangejourneys in time. From Ray Bradbury's "A Sound of Thunder" to Arthur C. Clarke's "All the Time in the World" to Penelope Lively's "The Picnic," this book includes some of the most respected SF and literary authors in the world and delightful newcomers as well. Amusing, amazing, and enthralling, TheYoung Oxford Book of Timewarp Stories is a brain-bending exploration of the twists and turns of time.
author: Dennis Pepper
